document.full_text: dr. dre has emerged victorious in a lawsuit against his former label, which put out a new version of his iconic album "the chronic" and a greatest hits collection, without his permission.
document.title: dr. dre wins judgment over "chronic" reissue
lines_and_colors: dr. dre has emerged victorious in a lawsuit against his former label, which put out a new version of his iconic album "the chronic" and a greatest hits collection, without his permission.
